biography: Tracy Brooks Swope was born on February 20, 1953 in New York City, New York, as Margaret Tracy Brooks Swope. She is an actress and producer, known for General Hospital (1963), Another World (1964) and The Power of One (1992). She was previously married to John G. Avildsen.
name: Tracy Brooks Swope
place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
